title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicola Greene. Author. Sarah Hennessy. Author. Tate W. Rogers. Author. Jocelyn Tsai. Author. Francis L. de los Reyes III. Author. Lars Schöbitz. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Greene N, Hennessy S, Rogers T, Tsai J, III F, Schöbitz L (2023). “fsmglobal. Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand.” doi:10.5281/zenodo.8208293, https://openwashdata.github.io/fsmglobal/.
code: @Misc{greenehennessy:2023,   title = {fsmglobal. Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand},   author = {Nicola Greene and Sarah Hennessy and Tate W. Rogers and Jocelyn Tsai and Francis L. de los Reyes III and Lars Schöbitz},   year = {2023},   url = {https://openwashdata.github.io/fsmglobal/},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.8208293},   abstract = {Global faecal sludge emptying demand data for 175 countries. Demand is quantified by population size receiving one of four emptying methods (mechanized, non-mechanized, unemptiable, no facility). The demand is disaggregated by rural and urban percentages of population.},   version = {0.0.1}, }

title: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand
text: data first published part journal article (Greene et al. 2021) contained supplemental material table DOCX file.

title: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand
text: can install fsmglobal GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table .

title: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand
text: package provides access one dataset. fsmglobal data set 9 variables 700 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand
text: code table show summary demand faecal sludge emptying services. Find examples vignette("examples").
code: library(fsmglobal) library(gt) library(dplyr) tbl_emptying_demand_global <- fsmglobal |>    group_by(emptying_method) |>    summarise(     sum_population_emptying_method = sum(population_emptying_method)   ) |>    mutate(     percent = sum_population_emptying_method /        sum(sum_population_emptying_method) * 100   ) tbl_emptying_demand_global |>    janitor::adorn_totals() |>      # use gt R package to prepare a table   gt(rowname_col = "emptying_method") |>   tab_header(title = md("**Demand for faecal sludge emptying services**"),               subtitle = "summarised for 175 countries") |>    fmt_number(columns = "sum_population_emptying_method", decimals = 0) |>    fmt_percent(columns = "percent", decimals = 0, scale_values = FALSE) |>    cols_label(sum_population_emptying_method = "population")

what: fsmglobal: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand — fsmglobal-package
title: fsmglobal: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand — fsmglobal-package
text: Global faecal sludge emptying demand data 175 countries. Demand quantified population size receiving one four emptying methods (mechanized, non-mechanized, unemptiable, facility). demand disaggregated rural urban percentages population.

title: fsmglobal: Global Faecal Sludge Emptying Services Demand — fsmglobal-package
text: Maintainer: Lars Schöbitz lschoebitz@ethz.ch (ORCID) Authors: Nicola Greene nicola@opero-services.com (ORCID) Sarah Hennessy sarah@triangle-environmental.com (ORCID) Tate W. Rogers tate@triangle-environmental.com (ORCID) Jocelyn Tsai jct33@unc.edu (ORCID) Francis L. de los Reyes III fldelosr@ncsu.edu (ORCID)

title: fsmglobal — fsmglobal
text: Populations 175 countries requiring faecal sludge emptying services.

title: fsmglobal — fsmglobal
text: tibble 700 rows 9 variables: iso3c International Standards Organization (ISO) 3-digit alphabetic codes. country Name country. emptying_method Type faecal sludge emptying method corresponding population population_emptying_method. population_2017 Total country population 2017. population_emptying_method Total population requiring faecal sludge emptying services type method identified emptying_method. count_pits_septics Total number pit latrines septic tanks country. emptying_demand Emptying demand proportion population_emptying_method / population_2017. urban_demand Proportion urban population. rural_demand Proportion rural population.

title: fsmglobal — fsmglobal
text: Originally published : Greene, N., Hennessy, S., Rogers, T. W., Tsai, J., & de los Reyes III, F. L. (2021). role emptying services provision safely managed sanitation: classification quantification needs LMICs. Journal Environmental Management, 290, 112612. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jenvman.2021.112612
